column4: so i cannot defrag an external fat32 partition? how am i supposed to backup 150 gigs on this drive then format it? thats not practical
Can't you defrag it from Windows?
ntfs and fat{16,32} are Windows file systems (and not very good ones). I doubt you will find a Linux app to convert a crap fs to ext3 and do the job well.
mabus Can we take the parition magik discussion to another channel please?
